title: Ammar Sabir Cheema
text:
Independent bioinformatics consulting for research laboratories and biotech teams.
I design and implement rigorous computational workflows for genomics, transcriptomics, and integrative multi-omics analysis — transforming raw sequencing data into reproducible, interpretable scientific results.

title: Ammar Sabir Cheema
text:
Independent bioinformatics consulting for research laboratories and biotech teams.
I design and implement rigorous computational workflows for genomics, transcriptomics, and integrative multi-omics analysis — transforming raw sequencing data into reproducible, interpretable scientific results.

title: Ammar Sabir Cheema
text:
What I Do

Multi-Omics Data Analysis
End-to-end analysis of RNA-seq and integrative omics datasets — from quality control and quantification to statistical modeling and biological interpretation.


Pipeline Development & Automation
Design of structured, reproducible computational workflows with clear documentation and scalable architecture.


Statistical Modeling & Interpretation
Differential expression analysis, integrative modeling, and robust statistical evaluation tailored to research and translational objectives.


Reproducible Workflow Design
Transparent, version-controlled systems that ensure long-term maintainability and reproducibility.

title: Ammar Sabir Cheema
text:
Selected Work
Integrative Transcriptomics Analysis
Designed reproducible workflows for multi-omics datasets enabling biologically interpretable classification and signature discovery.
Automated Genomics Pipelines
Developed structured computational pipelines for scalable sequencing data processing and downstream analysis.
Translational Data Integration
Implemented statistical integration strategies to support responder/non-responder modeling in complex datasets.

title: Ammar Sabir Cheema
text:
Why Work With Me

Strong methodological foundation in computational biology

Emphasis on reproducibility and structured workflow architecture

Clear communication with both computational and wet-lab researchers

Independent, focused collaboration with direct engagement

My objective is not only to analyze data, but to build computational systems that remain reliable and interpretable beyond a single project.

title: Ammar Sabir Cheema
text:
Let’s Discuss Your Project
If you are planning a genomics or multi-omics study and require structured computational expertise, feel free to get in touch.
